thread.title: BRIEF-CenterPoint Energy Says Upon Termination Of Deal, Co To Pay Termination Fee Of $210 Mln To Vectren

title: BRIEF-CenterPoint Energy Says Upon Termination Of Deal, Co To Pay Termination Fee Of $210 Mln To Vectren

organizations.name: brief-centerpoint energy says upon termination of deal

text:
April 23, 2018 / 10:55 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-CenterPoint Energy Says Upon Termination Of Deal, Co To Pay Termination Fee Of $210 Mln To Vectren Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - CenterPoint Energy Inc: 
* CENTERPOINT ENERGY SAYS UPON TERMINATION OF DEAL UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, CO WOULD BE REQUIRED TO PAY TERMINATION FEE OF $210 MILLION TO VECTREN 
* CENTERPOINT ENERGY - UPON TERMINATION OF DEAL UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, VECTREN WOULD BE REQUIRED TO PAY TERMINATION FEE OF $150 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2K8nAHk ) Further company coverage:
